text: ideul-eun adam-ui jasondeul gaunde hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun yeeonjadeul-ila geu jung-eneun noawa hamkke bangjue oleun jaga iss-eossgo abeula hamgwa iseula-el jason-i iss-eumyeo geu jung-eneun hananim-i olh-eun gillo indo han jaga iss-eumyeo seontaeghan jaga iss-eossnola hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege gyesidoeeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun buboghago gyeongbaehayeo nunmul-eul heullyeossnola
